name: part_001
file: tmp_【重大発表あり!!!】宝鐘マリン生誕祭 3D LIVE！豪華ゲスト＆新曲お披露目！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [NxtHvRVLzXM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Kobo Kanaeru perform a high-energy medley starting with 'I wanna party'.
Performance of the song 'Overdose' by Houshou Marine and Kobo Kanaeru.
Performance of 'Aibo Dancehall' featuring Houshou Marine, Hakuui Koyori, and Kazama Iroha.

subtitles.original: (Oh baby!)
subtitles.english: (Oh baby!)

subtitles.original: All eyes on me I can taste the fire
subtitles.english: All eyes on me I can taste the fire

subtitles.original: Aye まだまだ沸いてこうぜ
subtitles.english: Aye, let's keep it heating up!

subtitles.original: はーい注目 まぁいっちょ踊ってこうか？
subtitles.english: Attention everyone! Shall we dance one more time?

subtitles.original: 仙狐牛耳ってんのは…
subtitles.english: The one ruling over the Senko...

subtitles.original: Bring it back! One last time!
subtitles.english: Bring it back! One last time!

subtitles.original: アタシたちマジで最強じゃん？
subtitles.english: Aren't we seriously the strongest?

subtitles.original: Just two besties so fly! Ah-ah-ah.
subtitles.english: Just two besties so fly! Ah-ah-ah.

subtitles.original:
Overdose
作詞・作曲・編曲：なとり
subtitles.english:
Overdose
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: natori

subtitles.original:
本当は分かっていた
いけないことだったって、分かっていたのに
subtitles.english:
In truth, I knew.
I knew it was something I shouldn't do, and yet...

subtitles.original: この手をすり抜ける全部が愛に見えたの
subtitles.english: Everything that slipped through my hands looked like love.

subtitles.original: 確かめていた言葉が形になって、揺れるだけ
subtitles.english: The words I was confirming just take shape and sway.

subtitles.original: 確かめていた言葉が形になって、揺れるだけ
subtitles.english: The words I was confirming just take shape and sway.

subtitles.original: 弾いて、描いて きっと、それだけ
subtitles.english: Plucking, drawing, surely that's all.

subtitles.original: つまらない正解の読み合わせ
subtitles.english: Comparing boring correct answers.

subtitles.original: あとちょっとで分かりかけていたのに
subtitles.english: I was just about to understand.

subtitles.original: 飲んで、吐いて 全部忘れちゃえ
subtitles.english: Drink, vomit, and forget it all.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり やるせない日々
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, these helpless days.

subtitles.original: 解像度の悪い夢を見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see a low-resolution dream.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 甘いハッタリ
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, a sweet bluff.

subtitles.original: Don't stop it music, darling
subtitles.english: Don't stop it music, darling

subtitles.original:
本当に分かっている？
いけないことだったって、分かっている？
subtitles.english:
Do you really understand?
Do you understand it was something we shouldn't do?

subtitles.original: 多分、時間だけが過ぎていく 問答で満ちていく
subtitles.english: Probably only time passes, filling up with questions.

subtitles.original: 言い訳する間もなく、裸になってしまうだけ
subtitles.english: Without time for excuses, I just end up exposed.

subtitles.original: 言い訳する間もなく、裸になってしまうだけ
subtitles.english: Without time for excuses, I just end up exposed.

subtitles.original: きっと、溜まっていくんだ ずっと
subtitles.english: Surely, it'll keep piling up, forever.

subtitles.original: 終わってしまえばいいと、ふっと
subtitles.english: Suddenly wishing it would all just end.

subtitles.original: あの甘い果実のように僕ら、壊れていく
subtitles.english: Like that sweet fruit, we're breaking down.

subtitles.original: 踊って、眠って 全部忘れちゃえ
subtitles.english: Dance, sleep, and forget it all.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 分かりたいのに
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, I want to understand you, but...

subtitles.original: 変に間の悪い嘘が嫌い
subtitles.english: I hate lies with strangely bad timing.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 分かりたいのに
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, I want to understand you, but...

subtitles.original: Two step from hell with me, darling
subtitles.english: Two step from hell with me, darling

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり やるせない日々
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, these helpless days.

subtitles.english: I want to see a low-resolution dream.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 甘いハッタリ
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, a sweet bluff.

subtitles.original: Don't stop it music, darling
subtitles.english: Don't stop it music, darling

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 分からないけど
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, I don't know but...

subtitles.original: 変に間の悪い夢でもいいから
subtitles.english: Even a dream with strangely bad timing is fine.

subtitles.original: Overdose 君とふたり 甘いハッタリ
subtitles.english: Overdose, just the two of us, a sweet bluff.

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール 今日はボレロ
subtitles.english: Aibo Dancehall, today is a bolero.

subtitles.original: 濁った少年 甘酸っぱい感情
subtitles.english: Muddled boy, bittersweet feelings.

subtitles.original: 求愛人類ハイファイ・アバヨ
subtitles.english: Courtship mankind, Hi-Fi goodbye.

subtitles.original: オーブントースター 零れ漏れよ
subtitles.english: Oven toaster, let it spill over.

subtitles.original: おかわりならアルコール次第ね
subtitles.english: If you want seconds, it depends on the alcohol.

subtitles.original: 終わらないラブコール・ダンス・デイ
subtitles.english: Never-ending love call dance day.

subtitles.original:
愛包ダンスホール
作詞：Gohgo 作曲：涼木シンジ 編曲：涼木シンジ
subtitles.english:
Aibo Dancehall
Lyrics: Gohgo, Music: Ryoki Shinji, Arrangement: Ryoki Shinji

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aibo Dancehall.

subtitles.original: おかわりならもう一回
subtitles.english: If you want seconds, one more time.

subtitles.original: 愛包ダンスホール
subtitles.english: Aibo Dancehall.

subtitles.original: 割り切れない気持ち抱えてるよ
subtitles.english: I'm holding onto feelings that don't add up.

subtitles.original:
ロボ人も幻人も亜人もエンジニアも
エンジン組んで仲良くやれたらとか
subtitles.english:
Robot people, phantoms, demi-humans, and engineers,
if we could all just get along together...

subtitles.original: 割り切れない生命いさかいのヘブン
subtitles.english: A divisive life, a heaven of conflict.

subtitles.original: 今夜はいいんじゃない？ ほらオエオエオエオエヨ
subtitles.english: Isn't tonight fine? Look, woe-woe-woe-woe-yo.

subtitles.original: 踊ればいいんじゃない？ ほらブリブリブランレバ
subtitles.english: Why not just dance? Look, shake-shake-shake-it-up.

subtitles.original: 休戦しようぜ 涙が湧泉温泉
subtitles.english: Let's call a truce, tears are hot spring gushers.

subtitles.original: 汗ばんだらガンダーラ・サンサーラ
subtitles.english: If you get sweaty, Gandhara Samsara.

subtitles.original: なに言ってんだ？（自問自答）
subtitles.english: What am I even saying? (Talking to self)

subtitles.original: 高まった感動の再会
subtitles.english: An emotional and moving reunion.

subtitles.original: 集まった愛情のWi-Fi
subtitles.english: A gathered Wi-Fi of affection.

subtitles.original: 持寄った常灯の人影
subtitles.english: Shadows gathered under the eternal light.

subtitles.original: 愛してるが重なって 狂まった人類の状態
subtitles.english: Piling up 'I love you's, the state of mankind gone mad.
